cia8520.v

00024 
00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief Commodore 8520 Complex Interface Adapter implementation.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief cia8520.v
00030 */
00031 module cia8520(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input CLK_I,
00035     input reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00039     //% @{
00040     input CYC_I,
00041     input STB_I,
00042     input WE_I,
00043     input [3:0] ADR_I,
00044     input [7:0] DAT_I,
00045     output reg ACK_O,
00046     output reg [7:0] DAT_O,
00047     //% @}
00048     
00049     //% \name Internal OCS ports

00050     //% @{
00051     input pulse_709379_hz,
00052     //% @}
00053     
00054     //% \name 8520 synchronous interface

00055     //% @{
00056     output [7:0] pa_o,
00057     output [7:0] pb_o,
00058     input [7:0] pa_i,
00059     input [7:0] pb_i,
00060     
00061     input flag_n,
00062     output reg pc_n,
00063     input tod,
00064     output irq_n,
00065     
00066     input sp_i,
00067     output reg sp_o,
00068     input cnt_i,
00069     output reg cnt_o
00070     //% @}
00071 );
00072 
00073 reg [7:0] pa_o_reg;
00074 assign pa_o = (ddra & pa_o_reg) | (~ddra & pa_i);
00075 reg [7:0] pb_o_reg;
00076 assign pb_o = (ddrb & pb_o_reg) | (~ddrb & pb_i);
00077 
00078 assign irq_n = ~icr_data[5];
00079 
00080 reg last_cnt_i;
00081 
00082 // 0 = input, 1 = output
00083 reg [7:0] ddra;
00084 reg [7:0] ddrb;
00085 
00086 reg [15:0] timera_latch;
00087 reg [15:0] timerb_latch;
00088 reg [5:0] cra;
00089 reg [6:0] crb;
00090 reg [23:0] tod_counter;
00091 reg [23:0] tod_latch;
00092 reg tod_write_stop;
00093 reg tod_read_latch;
00094 reg [23:0] tod_alarm;
00095 
00096 reg serial_irq;
00097 reg [7:0] serial_latch;
00098 reg serial_latched;
00099 reg [7:0] serial_shift;
00100 reg [4:0] serial_counter;
00101 
00102 reg [5:0] icr_mask;
00103 reg [5:0] icr_data;
00104 
00105 wire icr_data_read;
00106 assign icr_data_read = (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd13) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00107 
00108 // from datasheet:
00109 // write high && one-shot && stopped(?) ----> timer <= latch; initiate counting regardless start; start <= 1'b1(?)
00110 // write high && stopped ----> timer <= latch;
00111 // write high && running ----> latch
00112 
00113 // Timer A
00114 reg [15:0] timera;
00115 reg underflowa;
00116 
00117 wire timera_force_load;
00118 assign timera_force_load = 
00119     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd14 && DAT_I[4] == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00120 
00121 wire timera_loadhigh_when_stopped;
00122 assign timera_loadhigh_when_stopped = 
00123     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd5 && cra[0] == 1'b0 && ACK_O == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00124 
00125 wire timera_tick;
00126 assign timera_tick =
00127     (cra[0] == 1'b1 &&
00128         ( 
00129             (cra[4] == 1'b0 && pulse_709379_hz == 1'b1) ||
00130             (cra[4] == 1'b1 && last_cnt_i == 1'b0 && cnt_i == 1'b1)
00131         )
00132     ) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00133 
00134 // Timer B
00135 reg [15:0] timerb;
00136 reg underflowb;
00137 
00138 wire timerb_force_load;
00139 assign timerb_force_load = 
00140     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd15 && DAT_I[4] == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00141 
00142 wire timerb_loadhigh_when_stopped;
00143 assign timerb_loadhigh_when_stopped = 
00144     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd7 && crb[0] == 1'b0 && ACK_O == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00145 
00146 wire timerb_tick;
00147 assign timerb_tick = 
00148     (crb[0] == 1'b1 &&
00149         (
00150             (crb[5:4] == 2'b00 && pulse_709379_hz == 1'b1) ||
00151             (crb[5:4] == 2'b01 && last_cnt_i == 1'b0 && cnt_i == 1'b1) ||
00152             (crb[5:4] == 2'b10 && underflowa == 1'b1) ||
00153             (crb[5:4] == 2'b11 && underflowa == 1'b1 && cnt_i == 1'b1)             
00154         ) 
00155     ) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00156 
00157 wire alarm;
00158 assign alarm = (tod_counter == tod_alarm);
00159 
00160 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00161     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00162         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00163         DAT_O <= 8'd0;
00164         
00165         pa_o_reg <= 8'd0;
00166         pb_o_reg <= 8'd0;
00167         ddra <= 8'd0;
00168         ddrb <= 8'd0;
00169         
00170         timera <= 16'd0;
00171         underflowa <= 1'b0;
00172         timerb <= 16'd0;
00173         underflowb <= 1'b0;
00174         
00175         timera_latch <= 16'hFFFF;
00176         timerb_latch <= 16'hFFFF;
00177         cra <= 6'd0;
00178         crb <= 7'd0;
00179         
00180         tod_counter <= 24'd0;
00181         tod_latch <= 24'd0;
00182         tod_write_stop <= 1'b1;
00183         tod_read_latch <= 1'b0;
00184         tod_alarm <= 24'd0;
00185         
00186         pc_n <= 1'b1;
00187         
00188         sp_o <= 1'b1;
00189         cnt_o <= 1'b1;
00190         serial_irq <= 1'b0;
00191         serial_latch <= 8'd0;
00192         serial_latched <= 1'b0;
00193         serial_shift <= 8'd0;
00194         serial_counter <= 5'd0;
00195         
00196         icr_mask <= 6'd0;
00197         icr_data <= 6'd0;
00198     end
00199     else begin
00200         last_cnt_i <= cnt_i;
00201     
00202         if(ACK_O == 1'b1)                           ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00203         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1)     ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00204         
00205         if(tod == 1'b1 && tod_write_stop == 1'b0) tod_counter <= tod_counter + 24'd1;
00206         
00207         if(pc_n == 1'b0) pc_n <= 1'b1;
00208         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd1 && ACK_O == 1'b1) pc_n <= 1'b0;
00209         
00210         // interrupt data
00211         if(underflowa == 1'b1)  icr_data[0] <= 1'b1;        else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[0] <= 1'b0;
00212         if(underflowb == 1'b1)  icr_data[1] <= 1'b1;        else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[1] <= 1'b0;
00213         if(alarm == 1'b1)       icr_data[2] <= 1'b1;        else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[2] <= 1'b0;
00214         if(serial_irq == 1'b1)  icr_data[3] <= 1'b1;        else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[3] <= 1'b0;
00215         if(flag_n == 1'b0)      icr_data[4] <= 1'b1;        else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[4] <= 1'b0;
00216         
00217         if( (underflowa == 1'b1     && icr_mask[0] == 1'b1) ||
00218             (underflowb == 1'b1     && icr_mask[1] == 1'b1) ||
00219             (alarm == 1'b1          && icr_mask[2] == 1'b1) ||
00220             (serial_irq == 1'b1     && icr_mask[3] == 1'b1) ||
00221             (flag_n == 1'b0         && icr_mask[4] == 1'b1)
00222         ) begin
00223             icr_data[5] <= 1'b1;
00224         end
00225         else if(icr_data_read == 1'b1) icr_data[5] <= 1'b0;
00226         
00227         
00228         //******** SERIAL
00229         if(serial_irq == 1'b1) serial_irq <= 1'b0;
00230         
00231         // serial output
00232         if(cra[5] == 1'b1) begin
00233             if(serial_counter == 5'd0 && serial_latched == 1'b1) begin
00234                 serial_shift <= serial_latch;
00235                 serial_counter <= 5'd1;
00236                 serial_latched <= 1'b0;
00237             end
00238             else if(serial_counter > 5'd0 && serial_counter[0] == 1'b1 && underflowa == 1'b1) begin
00239                  serial_counter <= serial_counter + 5'd1;
00240                  cnt_o <= 1'b0;
00241                  sp_o <= serial_shift[7];
00242                  serial_shift <= { serial_shift[6:0], 1'b0 };
00243             end
00244             else if(serial_counter > 5'd0 && serial_counter[0] == 1'b0 && underflowa == 1'b1) begin
00245                  cnt_o <= 1'b1;
00246                  if(serial_counter == 5'd16) begin
00247                     if(serial_latched == 1'b0) begin
00248                         serial_irq <= 1'b1;
00249                         serial_counter <= 5'd0;
00250                     end
00251                     else begin
00252                         serial_shift <= serial_latch;
00253                         serial_counter <= 5'd1;
00254                         serial_latched <= 1'b0;
00255                     end
00256                  end
00257                  else serial_counter <= serial_counter + 5'd1;
00258             end
00259         end
00260         // serial input
00261         else begin
00262             if(last_cnt_i == 1'b0 && cnt_i == 1'b1) begin
00263                 serial_shift <= { serial_shift[6:0], sp_i };
00264                 
00265                 if(serial_counter == 5'd7) begin
00266                     serial_counter <= 5'd0;
00267                     serial_latch <= { serial_shift[6:0], sp_i };
00268                     serial_irq <= 1'b1;
00269                     serial_counter <= 5'd0;
00270                 end
00271                 else serial_counter <= serial_counter + 5'd1;
00272             end
00273         end
00274         
00275         // Timer A
00276         // PBON==on, OUTMODE==toggle, START==on
00277         if(cra[1] == 1'b1 && cra[2] == 1'b1 && cra[0] == 1'b1) pb_o_reg[6] <= 1'b1;
00278         // PBON==on, OUTMODE==pulse
00279         else if(cra[1] == 1'b1 && cra[2] == 1'b0) pb_o_reg[6] <= underflowa;
00280         
00281         // START==on, RUNMODE==single-shot, underflowa
00282         if(cra[0] == 1'b1 && cra[3] == 1'b1 && underflowa == 1'b1) cra[0] <= 1'b0;
00283         
00284         if(underflowa == 1'b1) underflowa <= 1'b0;
00285         
00286         if(timera_force_load == 1'b1 || timera_loadhigh_when_stopped == 1'b1) timera <= timera_latch;
00287         else if(timera_tick == 1'b1 && timera == 16'd1) begin
00288             timera <= timera_latch;
00289             underflowa <= 1'b1;
00290         end
00291         else if(timera_tick == 1'b1) timera <= timera - 16'd1;
00292         
00293         
00294         // Timer B
00295         // PBON==on, OUTMODE==toggle, START==on
00296         if(crb[1] == 1'b1 && crb[2] == 1'b1 && crb[0] == 1'b1) pb_o_reg[7] <= 1'b1;
00297         // PBON==on, OUTMODE==pulse
00298         else if(crb[1] == 1'b1 && crb[2] == 1'b0) pb_o_reg[7] <= underflowb;
00299         
00300         // START==on, RUNMODE==single-shot, underflowa
00301         if(crb[0] == 1'b1 && crb[3] == 1'b1 && underflowb == 1'b1) crb[0] <= 1'b0;
00302         
00303         if(underflowb == 1'b1) underflowb <= 1'b0;
00304         
00305         if(timerb_force_load == 1'b1 || timerb_loadhigh_when_stopped == 1'b1) timerb <= timerb_latch;
00306         else if(timerb_tick == 1'b1 && timerb == 16'd1) begin
00307             timerb <= timerb_latch;
00308             underflowb <= 1'b1;
00309         end
00310         else if(timerb_tick == 1'b1) timerb <= timerb - 16'd1;
00311         
00312         // Port Register A write
00313         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd0)         pa_o_reg <= DAT_I;
00314         // Port Register A read
00315         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd0)    DAT_O <= (ddra & pa_o_reg) | (~ddra & pa_i);
00316         // Port Register B write
00317         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd1) begin
00318             if(cra[1] == 1'b0 && crb[1] == 1'b0)        pb_o_reg <= DAT_I;
00319             else if(cra[1] == 1'b1 && crb[1] == 1'b0)   {pb_o_reg[7],pb_o_reg[5:0]} <= {DAT_I[7],DAT_I[5:0]};
00320             else if(cra[1] == 1'b0 && crb[1] == 1'b1)   pb_o_reg[6:0]               <= DAT_I[6:0];
00321             else if(cra[1] == 1'b1 && crb[1] == 1'b1)   pb_o_reg[5:0]               <= DAT_I[5:0];
00322         end
00323         // Port Register B read
00324         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd1)    DAT_O <= (ddrb & pb_o_reg) | (~ddrb & pb_i);
00325         // Data Direction Register A write
00326         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd2)    ddra <= DAT_I;
00327         // Data Direction Register A read
00328         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd2)    DAT_O <= ddra;
00329         // Data Direction Register B write
00330         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd3)    ddrb <= DAT_I;
00331         // Data Direction Register B read
00332         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd3)    DAT_O <= ddrb;
00333         
00334         // Timer A Low byte write
00335         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd4)    timera_latch[7:0] <= DAT_I;
00336         // Timer A Low byte read
00337         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd4)    DAT_O <= timera[7:0];
00338         // Timer A High byte write
00339         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd5) begin
00340             timera_latch[15:8] <= DAT_I;
00341             // START==off, RUNMODE==single-shot
00342             if(cra[0] == 1'b0 && cra[3] == 1'b1) cra[0] <= 1'b1;
00343         end
00344         // Timer A High byte read
00345         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd5)    DAT_O <= timera[15:8];
00346         
00347         // Timer B Low byte write
00348         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd6)    timerb_latch[7:0] <= DAT_I;
00349         // Timer B Low byte read
00350         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd6)    DAT_O <= timerb[7:0];
00351         // Timer B High byte write
00352         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd7) begin
00353             timerb_latch[15:8] <= DAT_I;
00354             // START==off, RUNMODE==single-shot
00355             if(crb[0] == 1'b0 && crb[3] == 1'b1) crb[0] <= 1'b1;
00356         end
00357         // Timer B High byte read
00358         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd7)    DAT_O <= timerb[15:8];
00359         
00360         // TOD/ALARM low byte write
00361         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd8) begin
00362             if(crb[6] == 1'b0) begin
00363                 tod_counter[7:0] <= DAT_I;
00364                 tod_write_stop <= 1'b0;
00365             end
00366             else tod_alarm[7:0] <= DAT_I;
00367         end
00368         // TOD low byte read
00369         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd8) begin
00370             if(tod_read_latch == 1'b0) DAT_O <= tod_counter[7:0];
00371             else begin
00372                 DAT_O <= tod_latch[7:0];
00373                 tod_read_latch <= 1'b0;
00374             end
00375         end
00376         // TOD/ALARM mid byte write
00377         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd9) begin
00378             if(crb[6] == 1'b0) begin
00379                 tod_counter[15:8] <= DAT_I;
00380             end
00381             else tod_alarm[15:8] <= DAT_I;
00382         end
00383         // TOD mid byte read
00384         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd9) begin
00385             if(tod_read_latch == 1'b0) DAT_O <= tod_counter[15:8];
00386             else DAT_O <= tod_latch[15:8];
00387         end
00388         // TOD/ALARM high byte write
00389         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd10) begin
00390             if(crb[6] == 1'b0) begin
00391                 tod_counter[23:16] <= DAT_I;
00392                 tod_write_stop <= 1'b1;
00393             end
00394             else tod_alarm[23:16] <= DAT_I;
00395         end
00396         // TOD high byte read
00397         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd10) begin
00398             DAT_O <= tod_counter[23:16];
00399             tod_latch <= tod_counter;
00400             tod_read_latch <= 1'b1;
00401         end
00402         // empty register write
00403         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd11) begin
00404         end
00405         // empty register read
00406         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd11)   DAT_O <= 8'd0;
00407         // Serial Data Register write
00408         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd12) begin
00409             serial_latch <= DAT_I;
00410             serial_latched <= 1'b1;
00411         end
00412         // Serial Data Register read
00413         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd12)    DAT_O <= serial_latch;
00414         // Interrupt Control Register write
00415         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd13) begin
00416             if(DAT_I[7] == 1'b1)  icr_mask <= icr_mask | DAT_I[5:0];
00417             else                  icr_mask <= icr_mask & (~DAT_I[5:0]);
00418         end
00419         // Interrupt Control Register read
00420         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd13)   DAT_O <= { icr_data[5], 2'b0, icr_data[4:0] };
00421          
00422         // Control Register A write
00423         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd14) begin
00424             cra <= { DAT_I[6:5], DAT_I[3:0] };
00425             
00426             if(cra[5] != DAT_I[6]) begin
00427                 serial_latched <= 1'b0;
00428                 serial_counter <= 5'd0;
00429                 
00430                 cnt_o <= 1'b1;
00431                 sp_o <= (DAT_I[6] == 1'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00432             end
00433         end
00434         // Control Register A read
00435         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd14)   DAT_O <= { 1'b0, cra[5:4], 1'b0, cra[3:0] };
00436         // Control Register B write
00437         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 && ADR_I == 4'd15)   crb <= { DAT_I[7:5], DAT_I[3:0] };
00438         // Control Register B read
00439         else if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && ADR_I == 4'd15)   DAT_O <= { crb[6:4], 1'b0, crb[3:0] };
00440     end
00441 end
00442 
00443 endmodule
